text:
@TerryMoran A good luck???? 
Seriously? Did you really just tweet that???
It’s a PANDEMIC you dolt! Not a beauty pageant. 
His mask protects other people from potentially spreading Covid19. Everyone should be wearing a face covering in public!

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
